text: Poonilavu is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film directed by Thejas Perumanna and starring Sudheesh and MG Soman in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Sudheesh * Baby Ambili * Baby Chaithanya * Beena Antony * MG Soman * Mamukkoya ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Poonilavu
